storyInfo: Maylander emerges victorious amidst the intrigue. Saria and Ifrit encounter Silence as the dust settles.

attributes.content: I feel like I'm a kid in a classroom, having a science lesson for the first time. It's no hyperbole at all to say that 'science is the future of Columbia.'
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: I regret not being able to stay longer and hear about your other projects.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: You are always welcome at Rhine Lab, Mr. Jackson.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Thank you, Director Jara. I hope my visit didn't cause too much inconvenience.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Kind of you to say so. It was a pleasure to be your tour guide today.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Having the famous Marianne Blake as a tour guide alone makes this trip to Trimounts worthwhile.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Between the two of us, I'm a pretty big fan of yours.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: I have an autographed poster of your debut film on the office wall.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: A present from my wife when I was elected.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Kindly make a note to follow up with the special district government about Rhine Lab's application for a new research facility.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Will do, sir.
attributes.name: Vice President's Secretary

attributes.content: I guess that will be it for today, Miss Jara.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: I wish you a pleasant stay at Trimounts.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: May the sun shine on the next day, as it has today.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Come on, mash that photo button!
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: Mr. Vice President! What did you think about your trip to Rhine today?
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: Ask your questions in order, please! We have ten minutes, there's no rush.
attributes.name: Rhine Staff

attributes.content: You heard me right. I'm clapping.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: 'Vice President's Visit Bolsters Rhine Lab’s Claim as Industry Leader'... the headlines write themselves.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The tour concluded without incident. The Vice President will leave Rhine Lab in ten minutes.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...Doctor.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I got the map you sent, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: So there's a secret passage that leads right to the underground structure, but it's not in the plans that Muelsyse gave you?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Leave it to me!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I've been sitting here twiddling my thumbs while you and Rosmontis have fun with the power armor up there. Didn't even see a shadow.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Saria is coming for me?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Then I have to go to the underground structure too. The Vice President is leaving in a few minutes, right? We can't take any risks.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: (Whisper) Ifrit moving out, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm back.
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: How are things up there?
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: Not sure. I didn't quite make it up to the surface, but there was no commotion.
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: I'm guessing the attack failed.
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: What about us?
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: We activated the jammers and aren't supporting any other units... I don't think anyone is coming here. Ferdinand's route was very well-concealed.
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: Let's carry out the plan. It's almost time.
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: The explosives?
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: Set up while you were scouting... two tubes of advanced plastic explosives, enough to breach the containment structure.
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: You know, I thought Ferdinand wanted to come back to Rhine Lab. But this is the liquified Originium pipeline used by his Energy Section.
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: The Colonel says he's stuck in the same boat as us. He has no choice.
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: Don't really see the point of blowing this up now, though...
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: The Vice President should have left Rhine Lab by now. What good will blowing up the Originium pipes in the underground structure do?
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: The Colonel has his plans. All we need to do is follow orders.
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: Who goes there?
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: A... kid?
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: Looks like the Doctor's intel was good.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, you, I don't know why you're hiding here, but I think you oughta surrender now.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: We lost contact with all units?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Yes, sir. Sudden comms failure.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: The Vice President and his retinue, the press... no sign that anything is amiss. Looks like our guys were neutralized before they could move.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Reports indicate that our operations within Rhine are also being disrupted by the sudden appearance of some power armor.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: We're also losing signal from the cameras on the streets.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: We're losing control of the scene, sir.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: So, our best laid plans are like a sieve to the intelligence network of the Maylander Foundation.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: It's not surprising that they're able to respond, given how hastily this assassination plan was hatched.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Should we pull out, sir?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: They're bound to trace the trail back here, sooner or later.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: No hurry...
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Mr. Vice President said he would like to 'have a nice chat with top researchers.' I intend to oblige him.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Situation at C1 and C2?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Still in position. Signal stable.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Activate the remote control on the top-right of the panel, Riker.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: The remote control Blake referred to is a mundane mechanical button, fitted with an old-fashioned safety lock.
The soldier enters the password, and the cover pops open, revealing the red button.
What is this, sir?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Remote control for the explosives that will blow up the containment around the liquified Originium pipes.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Look at the screen. According to the routes that Ferdinand provided, the Energy Section has several liquified Originium pipelines running through the west wing of Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Rhine Lab Engineering does a thorough job.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: In addition to standard safety measures, there are also underground containment structures that prevent chain reactions in the event of a leak.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The original plan was to cause a leak with an explosion, creating a chance for operatives on the ground to approach Jackson.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: By chance, however, Jackson's convoy will cross over one of these pipelines on the way back.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: You're Rhine Lab staff?
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: I heard the Defense Section has a lot of bad-tempered people, but I'm surprised they would hire a kid so young.
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: I told you to surrender. I didn't say you could talk.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'll try to short stop of turning you to ashes. The Doctor and Saria may want to question you, after all.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Wait, is that a flamethrower?
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: Stop! There are liquified Originium pipes all around us!
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: So that's what's going on...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: The flaming-red Savra girl makes her decision in a split second. She re-engages the flamethrower's safety lock, and swings it hard at the one on the left.
Then she charges towards the one on the right, and catches the side of his face with her fist.
In the time it takes for a flame to flicker, Ifrit is back on her two feet again, dusting off her palms.
Grgh...
attributes.name: Agent A

attributes.content: I think my nose is broken...
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: Run, kid...
attributes.name: Agent B

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: What's that sound?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Damn, he started the countdown...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Less than one minute left—
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Can C1 and C2 make it back?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Their contributions will be remembered, as well all others who give their lives this day.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: But Colonel... it's an entire convoy. Five cars, a dozen people in the retinue, possibly even Rhine staff members and reporters, and other passersby...
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: You have your orders, Riker.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: But I...
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: I'll hit the switch myself. That's my job. Your job is to report as soon as you get a signal from C1 and C2.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: I won't defend myself if I stand trial for this someday.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: So I'm not going to waste my time explaining myself to my soldiers now.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: We have the signal!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: The Vice President's convoy is reaching the target area on the west side of Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Colonel?
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Blake places his hand on the cold mechanical button. A chill runs up his finger, and he pauses for a couple of seconds.
The soldier glances at his superior officer, whose brow is furrowed behind his sunglasses.
The soldier realizes that his commander is even more anxious than he is.
(Whisper) Damn it all to hell!
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Blake presses the button.
There is no sound, only an explosion on some of the screens.
On the tiny screen, the collapsing streets were like foam boards underneath bubbling flame. Then the screen goes black, the camera destroyed by flying debris.
There is no sound, but Blake and the soldier could hear the deafening boom in their heads.
The surface should be close, but I can't see the path with all these stone slabs in the way...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, are you two okay?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh no, a chain explosion.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit?!
Ifrit hears a familiar voice through the echoes of the explosion and the falling rubble.
Saria? I'm here!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I hear you... hang in there!
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I have a lock!
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Ifrit can hear Saria's voice shaking. Something touches her fingertips in the darkness. Calcium crystals? Saria's Originium Arts.
Like a stream of water, the crystals fill the gaps in the rubble, then expand, releasing a sickening crack—
Saria has forced an opening in the collapsed structure.
A hand reaches down from above. Ifrit grabs it and feels it pull her up, while the calcium tunnel shatters behind her.
Don't move.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'm fine, just a little dusty.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Your face... were you crying?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I-I wasn't crying! Just a little anxious, that's all.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Your hands are dusty too, Saria. You're making my face even dirtier.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh, sorry.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: And these two?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: They were the ones who planted the bomb that blew up the liquified Originium pipelines, so I brought them out.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But I couldn't stop the explosion...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You did well.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You really did.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What is it, Ifrit?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Silence? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...Silence.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Why are you here?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Mr. Vice President, Mr. Pavard, it's safe to go now.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The convoy?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: Just a couple of mechs blown up. No need to worry.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: This car has been modified by the Engineering Section. It may not look much, but you can trust it.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I hope you brought your driver's license, Mr. Pavard. We'll take a special passage on the east side. We've planned a new route for you.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The rest of your retinue will return in small groups once the dust has settled.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Was the explosion expected?
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: No, we wouldn't have allowed an explosion of this size to occur if we knew about it in advance.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But Rhine Lab and the Maylander Foundation's work isn't done until you're back safely at your residence... the enemy has more than one plan, and we have more than one contingency.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Very good.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: I just don't want to see 'Another Triton?' in the headlines tomorrow.
attributes.name: Jackson

attributes.content: There's no need to worry, we already have a plan in place for the press.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Once again, I wish you a pleasant stay in Trimounts.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Jackson
